reviews.sentence: Great location in the heart of Singapore. Very friendly and helpful check in and lobby staff. Great location and clean well equipped rooms. Not really bad but the air conditioning in the bedroom was very cold and it was not possible to adjust the temperature.
Recommended hotel in SG. The room service is prompt and good when the facility has some problems. Some noisy out of the room.
Good place to stay. Good room good facilities. No.

Lovely hotel 2nd visit and still very happy. I have just returned from a 6 night stay in this hotel with my 2 daughters and was delighted we chose to upgrade to a premier club room. The room was lovely and the club lounge was definately a huge plus. The staff in the club lounge could not have been more helpful and attentive and always with a welcoming smile the breakfast was eaten in a relaxed atmosphere and it was a lovely place for complimentary cocktails early evening. A special thankyou to Hanah on reception who had also helped me with some queries I made over the telephone the previous week and was also there to check us in. All other staff from cleaners to doormen are a credit to the hotel and we would like to extend our thanks to them all. This hotel is in a brilliant position with several lovely restaurants on the doorstep if you do not want to venture too far after a busy day out. Once again many thanks for a wonderful holiday.

Misleading pictures of hotel room. Recognised as an Expedia VIP upon check in and received complimentary breakfast and welcome fruit. The hotel room pictures published on Expedia looked so luxurious and chic which has nothing to do with the room I received. I do not even want to think about how terrible a Deluxe room that I originally booked would be as the room I stayed was considered an upgrade. Check in agent Jeremy was unpleasant. I booked three extra nights and he did not extend my key card to be valid for entire stay and even asked me to change my room for the extend stay because the hotel did not receive the so called upgrade email from Expedia for my new booking despite me showing him that proof that I booked exactly the same room category via Expedia mobile ap. What kind of service and flexibilityRom and wooden furnishing look very cheap. Carpet in corridor looks low class. Corridor lights flickering. Shower head is fixed water pressure is low both water at shower and hand basin takes long time to warm up. Toilet flush button leaking every time I press. Bathtub looks dirty which I do not dare to use at all. Black stain on duvet cover and pillow case. No power points near bedside. Alarm clock on bedside table shows incorrect time which is 49 mins slower than the actual local time and I nearly went to work late on my first day because of this. Only 1 proper socket at writing table for my laptop and one extra USB charging point for my phone that is it. Not practical if having multiple devices. Expedia VIP Access the noodle bar at lobby level The hotel is adjacent with Claymore Connect Mall where you will find hair dressers beauty salons supermarket wine shop an Irish bar and a Subway Install power points near bedside table room maintenance flexibility and service.

Excellent location with great facilities. My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at The Orchard Hotel. We were staying in a Signature room on the 16th floor which was on the front of the hotel and overlooking the top end of Orchard road. The room was beautifully decorated and spacious. The bed was large and comfortable. There are several dining options within the hotel and there is a good sized outdoor pool. The hotel is well situated for the shopping malls of Orchard road and is only a ten minute walk from Orchard MRT station beneath ION Shopping Mall. There is also a shopping complex in the basement of the hotel housing shops and food outlets. there is even an Irish Pub in thereAl of the staff we met were friendly and courteous and went out of their way to be of assistance. The room was cleaned daily and there was also an evening turn down service. I was most impressed when unfortunately my wife fell ill on our last day and we had to extend our stay by 24 hours. This was accomplished with no fuss and the management even took the time to call at the room with a gift of fruit and a get well card. All in all we were very impressed with the level of customer care during our stay. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel should you be looking for accommodation in Singapore. Many thanks.

Orchard Hotel Singapore Premier Club. The amenities were sufficient and the experience unforgettable. I enjoyed the service provided by the staff. They were very warm and accommodating. Thank you Premier Club for the heartwarming experience.

First time to Singapore. The hotel is very well located as most readers have said. It is very close to Orchard MRT on the red line IMAX restaurants and shops including Marks and Spencer. It is about 25 mins from the airport by car. The hotel has a direct access to a small shopping mall. The room was ok though was expecting a bit more from a five star hotel. Nevertheless the bed and pillows were very comfortable. There are free towels for the gym and swimming pool. What we did not like. We stayed in room 123 on the 12th floor next to the lift. It was noisy and would not recommend it. My husband wanted to move rooms but we had already settled and found packing our bags was too much work. We informed the staff on desk that our room safe was not working. This was not looked into so it was disappointing. Breakfast was a buffet but found it quite repetitive. It would be nice to have a much wider variety.

Birthday Special. I planned a great trip during my birthday weekend to visit Marina bay and splurge on some shopping and this was perfect for both these things. The hotel is perfectly located at Orchard road where there are shops after shops to satiate the shopaholic in you. It was 15 minute ride to Marina from the hotel too. The room as good size was very clean and had all basic amenities. They made the birthday special by sending me a surprise cake and card I think it is a great choice for a hotel to stay at.

Barely Tolerable. Reasonably located at the top of Orchard Road. Messy lobby area. Basic rooms with reasonable bathroom incl. bathThe stench of perfume in the room airconing system was overwhelming and extremely uncomfortable throughout the stay. This alone would keep me away. Dining outlets are very expensive and poor quality. There are plenty of places outside the hotel to eat. The pool and gym are reasonable as is the courtesy room – which includes showers toilets and newspapers.

Overall Good Stay. Stayed in prestige suit rooms. Although they are a bit aged the rooms are still spacious. Room cleaning is fantastic. Check in and check out was handy however this may be because my timing was not standard. Did not use the other facilities of the hotel but there is no need to mention that the location is perfect.

Present Stay Even Upgrade Work In Progress. During my stay although upgrade work is in progress noise and inconvenience is keep at very very minimum level. Spotted Guest Experience team Ms Yen greetings everyone at the lobby informing the upgrade work and apologise for inconvenience cause due to the upgrading work. Good approach. Looking forward to experience the upgrade during my next business trip.

Solid 35. Checking in was pleasant and smooth albeit a line up. Staff were very friendly from the doorman to the chamber maids. Room was very clean and comfortable. Room amenities and toiletries were more than adequate. Air condition worked well. House cleaning was very efficient. Pool was a nice welcome after a day of outing and shopping. But it does get a wee bit crowded. Breakfast spread was more than adequate. There was renovations repairs upgrades going on while I was there. It did not pose any inconvenience for me as the hotel managed to avert and detour guests accordingly. Location is great. in the heart of Orchard area. Shopping and F B outlets are walking distance from the hotel. I would stay here again if the price is right. It should be a 4 hotel but they seem to want to fill the rooms so there is busloads of tourists who descended upon the hotel while I was there. there is quite a storm during breakfast and a couple of days at the pool area. Other than that it is fine. Price is at the higher end of the mid range category. Recommended.
OK but noisy. Location was OK with a bus stop out the front room was good but being next to the elevators was very noisy all night.

Not brilliant. The staff are incredibly helpful welcoming the hotel is in a great position however there are MAJOR renovations going on the lobby has billboards all around it to block the work however they were drilling welding depending which floor you get off at the sparks were seen to be cascading down. We were only told about this a week before our holiday breakfast is in a shopping centre adjacent to the hotel whilst work is going on. Our room was on the 15th floor next to the lift which sounded like the MTR passing through the room was dark in desperate need of upgrading. It had an awful smell of. damp. Luckily we were only there two nights or I would have asked to be moved. Hopefully when the work is done it will be lovely however this was n’t a cheap hotel if I had a choice I definately would n’t go back until it had all been completed.
Exceptional. The staff was professional and very helpful. The breakfast was good but it is served in a very tiny area due to renovation works. The renovation works affects also the lobby.

Great Location. Stayed in this hotel several times in the past and just very recently when we attended a summit. Always been a good experience staying here. Except that this time the hotel is having renovations at the Lobby where the Lounge and coffee shops are located. This hotel has the perfect location. Easily accessible to anything anytime of the day. The cold storage at the claymore wing and several coffee shops and restaurants just within and around the hotel are an added comfort and convenience.

Location is convenient. Had an 8 course halal dinner at the ballroom. Food was not thay great. Slightly salty. Service was good prompt and professionally done. Would recommend for wedding receptions or for other events.

Lovely lunch reunion. We had a gathering here at the hotel cafe next to the lobby as the lunch buffet is value for money with its 1for1 offer. The variety of food is very good and ambience is lovely. We stayed for a long while even though its buffet is closed after lunch hour. Strongly recommended.
Overall is good. Swimming pool gym Center not bad. Breakfast buffet can be more variety and the taste of foods need to improve.

The hotel is ideally located at the top end of Orchard so great for access to Orchard Road. The room was fine very large comfortable bed along with good bathroom facilities. The lobby bar was ideal for meetings with a sensible long table and chairs for using lap tops etc. Mainly the queues for breakfast around peak times. Frankly put me off having to wait in line so went outside to one of the many coffee bars close by the hotel.

Exceptional. I was frequently using the gym and pool but unfortunatley they gave me a room at the Orchard Wing without straight axces to this facilities. I Need to go through the lobby to reach it. They could ask me during check inn. I am sure the big bunch of travelling groups also staying at the same time in the hotel did not use the gym and pool at all.

Facilities are ok but staff at concierge and reception are very unresponsive and not friendly. I had to wait for more than 10 minutes to get service as one of the desks was unattended. Seeing this staff from the other reception desks blatantly ignored my calls for help. Would never stay here again. On a side note staff at the room are also not eager to help. Any of my questions did not get polite responses and I somehow could not extend my checkout due to high occupancy when the hotel is clearly empty.

Signage Room. Arrived on Sunday evening after 10 pm reception was busy and there are only 2 receptionists available. Was waiting patiently. Eventually greeted by Shafiq who immediately apologized to me for waiting too long after handling 4 guests checking in at the same time. I asked about the “ newly renovated ” advertise hotel since I stayed in one of the signature rooms before. He then explained proudly in the most polite and nicest way what has been renovated. Additionally he offered if I ’d like to be upgraded – complimentary. My curiosity paid off the room is like I remember spacious and smell fresh. Every decoration in the room was astonishing. Could n’t look at just one corner. The bathroom is superb the mattress is very comfortable. Next morning as I was informed by Shafiq that I may be hearing some noise from the on going renovation before 9AM time passed by – I can assure you that no noise was ever heard until I checked out before noon. Will definitely revisit.

Horrible experience with rooms and service. I had booked two rooms that included twin beds before going to Singapore. When I arrived at the hotel I was told that I could only have ONE room that only had a double bed for the FOUR of us. This room was located on the 13th floor and I did not get the other room that I booked next to this room. I then had to wait 1 hour to get another room that was located on the 16TH FLOOR. I booked two rooms with twin beds but did not receive them. For three nights in a row I would ask the reception if I could have two rooms that were next to each other on the same floor but they ‘ tried their best ’ and still I did n’t get the rooms I had asked for. Also the doors close VERY LOUDLY when you leave your room which made it difficult to sleep at night when people would go into their room. I complained about this to the reception to ask for a room swap but once again I could n’t change my room. I ended having two rooms that were VERY FAR AWAY from each other on the same floor. I am very disappointed.
Gyms and pool is below average. Overall room experience was good. Not so for the room and gyms facilities.
Gyms and pool is below average. Overall room experience was good. Not so for the room and gyms facilities.

Located well but rest was crap pure. By early arrival we asked for early check in. Got this offered for 100 4hrs earlier. But we had to wait and come back all 30 to ask if ready. Meanwhile we drunk a coffee capucino. Though we were hotel guest listed for an expensive early check in we had to pay 22 for 2 beverages. After 25hrs of waiting we gave up. Room cleanliness was horrible. Our toothbrush glases had a cm thick layer of old toothpaste. Mentioned 3 times. no change hapend. Rest of cleanliness on same level. The breakfast venue reminds me to a cantina bright ice cold AC a bustle like x mas shopping on NY 5th avenue. And a deluxe room that offers a very small quensize bed is not also not state of the art anymore. 4 hangers in closet for 2 people also very poor dimensioned. Almost every drawer of furniture was occupied for amenties so we either had to squeeze our stuff into 2 small drawers or on a dirty shelf of let in 4days in the suitecase. My wife did the last. Good choice I took shelf and my white shirt was not white anymore. For shoes same issue. We parked them by lack of alternatives on the sofa so you avoid to stumble over it. Same situation in bath as well. Better leave all your staff in sewing bag because no other options availible. Our conclusion next time a different hotel and take a taxi to Orchard Road instead.
Pleasant. Noise from swimming pool staff not very helpful. Music playing too loudly in the foyer.

Great place in the city. Stayed here with my husband for 2 nights. Perfect for shopping or just sightseeing. Bus stop just outside the bar entrance of the hotel. We asked for a quiet room with a view and we got it. Lovely room overlooking the entrance. Nicely decorated very clean comfy bed with crisp white sheets fluffy pillows too. All amenities you would expect in the room very modern bathroom with a walk in rain shower. Restaurant for the buffet was superb with a vast selection of different hot and cold food. Very attentive staff and very friendly always offering advice. There was a choice of other restaurants within the hotel too. Reception staff were excellent very professional but friendly with it and made us feel very welcome. Shame we had a flight to catch or we would have stayed longer.
